outlet.digest: Grains each as their own channel.

objarg.name: granular-voices
objarg.digest: Number of granular voices per synth voice

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Midi notes determine the transposition and volume of each voice
method.description: Freezes are toggled by midi notes

method.name: adsr
method.digest: ADSR message to control the envelope of each voice

method.name: period
method.digest: The size of grains in the synth

method.name: update
method.digest: Messages prepended by update will update in real-time any message can follow this

method.name: autoUpdate
method.digest: Sets all messages to update in realtime without the need for a new voice

method.name: ---grain-flow-messages---
method.digest: Most grainflow messages will work on the freeze these do no work: state forceGrainReset travRandom rate

method.name: ngrains
method.digest: Sets the number of active grains. This may not exceed the maxiumum graincount

method.name: voices
method.digest: Sets the maximum number of grains

method.name: grain
method.digest: followed by an integer and a message- send this message to a specific grain

method.name: env
method.digest: Sets the grain envelope to a named buffer

method.name: buf
method.digest: Sets the granulation buffer

method.name: amp
method.digest: Grain Volume from 0 - 1

method.name: ampRandom
method.digest: Ranbdom Grain Volume from 0 - 1 - only attinuates

method.name: windowOffset
method.digest: The offset position of each subiquent grain on the grain phasor from 0 - 1

method.name: windowOffsetRandom
method.digest: Randomness applied to the offset position of each subiquent grain on the grain phasor

method.name: space
method.digest: Sets the amount of empty space per grain on the phasor
method.description: If this is 0, there each grain will take the entire phasor to complete. If it is 0.5, the grain will occur for half of the phasor length

method.name: spaceRandom
method.digest: Randomness applied to space

method.name: travOffset
method.digest: Traversal offset per grain in ms

method.name: travRandom
method.digest: Random traversal in ms

method.name: travGlobalOffset
method.digest: A global offset to the traversal in ms

method.name: rate
method.digest: The playback rate of the samples within each grain. Will cause a pitch shift

method.name: rateRandom
method.digest: Random playback rate of the samples within each grain.

method.name: direction
method.digest: The probablistic dirrection of each grain 1 is always forward -1 is always backward

method.name: rateOffset
method.digest: The playback rate of the samples within each grain per each subsiquent grain/

method.name: glisson
method.digest: A glissandom from the initial rate to n+ the initial rate over the duration of the grain

method.name: glissonRandom
method.digest: Randomness applied to glisson in rate

method.name: rateQuantizeSemi
method.digest: Will quanize rates to semitones

method.name: travMode
method.digest: Will set the traversal mode to one of the following 0: Traversal by messages (default) 1: Tranversal from buffer read by voices 2: Traversal from buffer read randomly per grain
method.description: This is useful when needing to dial in very specic traversals to design sounds. The buffer can be set using the travOffsets message

method.name: travOffsets
method.digest: Sets the traversal buffers for travMode 1 and 2

method.name: rateMode
method.digest: Will set the rate mode to one of the following 0: Rate by messages (default) 1: Rate from buffer read by voices 2: Rate from buffer read randomly per grain
method.description: This is useful when needing to dial in very specic rates to design sounds. The buffer can be set using the travOffsets message

method.name: rates
method.digest: Sets the rate buffers for rateMode 1 and 2

method.name: envMode
method.digest: Sets how envelopes are read to one of the following: 0: reads from a buffer containing 1 envelope (default) 1: Reads an envelope from buffer organized as a 2D wavetable read by voices 2 : does not exist but should be random like the others

method.name: env2D
method.digest: A buffer containing a 2D envelope wavetable for envMode 1

method.name: env2DNumber
method.digest: The number of envelopes in the 2D wavetable

method.name: env2DPosition
method.digest: The overall position in the 2Denv buffer

method.name: env2DRandom
method.digest: The randomness applied to the position the 2Denv buffer

method.name: windowOffsetMode
method.digest: Will set the rate mode to one of the following 0: windowOffset by messages (default) 1: windowOffset from buffer read by voices 2: windowOffset from buffer read randomly per grain

method.name: windowReadBias
method.digest: Will read the grain window so a polynomial. This is expensive and should be avoided if unneccisary.

attribute.name: any-message
attribute.digest: Any message can be set on instantiation as an attribute
